title: Is it possible to read 1000 pages a day? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have done it, in my 20s when on holiday, but only a fantastic book series which just had to be gulped down in one go. It is not something that I would recommend as normal practice, as it is probably not the healthiest way to spend a day.  If you are looking to build reading into your normal schedule, I would recommend something like 100-250 pages a day, as this allows for sustained reading without taking away from work, food or sleep.
